name: rylee
text: really good! the atmosphere is just so relaxing and amazing. such a chill spot. though, it’s not a place you would go to when you’re in a hurry because the wait is a bit long! but, it’s worth it in the end. the corn dogs has such a good crunch but mines didn’t have a cheese pull sadly, butttt it was still very yummy. the music is adorable and the staff is so friendly! i drove a whole hour to visit and i liked it! philly cheese steak toast was … literally…. so amazing. cute shop!

name: Katie Lunsford
text:
I wish I could give 0 stars.
Beware!! If you have egg allergies there's egg hidden everywhere!! Everywhere except the signage, menus or employees knowledge base.
The girl at the counter, the only employee we saw, had no clue what anything was, nothing. The minimal menu item information has no helpful or descriptive information whatsoever, just a name & poor picture.
I love to try new foods, but I also like to know WHAT I'm eating.
Don't bother wasting your time.

name: Jane Kim
text: Lovely atmosphere and great food options! If you’re in auburn looking for a unique dessert cafe, this is a great place to visit. I got the strawberry and cream croffle and it was delicious! Will definitely be back🤗

name: ceo of bad instrument playing
text: The owners are very kind and friendly. The employees are also very friendly and very good at their jobs. 1000/10 would eat again. The food is something that is so different from the other restaurants in the Auburn/Opelika area. Very fun and comfortable atmosphere! Overall wonderful experience!

name: Phani Krishna Kalakonda
text: It's a different take on fruit bowl and yoghurt. Definitely try it. One bowl should serve 2 to 3 adults unless you are HULK😅

name: Ashley Duncan
text: Our family supports local businesses, hostess was very friendly, she referred the spicy chicken toasty, and I ordered garlic shrimp took longer than estimated but fresh made to order, only 1 shrimp. Should definitely list on product description what the amazing egg veggie layer is to Americans was amazing, will definitely be back maybe a little quicker.

resp.text:
I'm sorry about shrimp there should be 3 jumbo shrimp.
I have talked with Cook.

name: Erica Jones
text: Frozen drink just taste like water.Price is over .Hot dogs were hard

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear about your poor experience. Due to the lack of employees, we are training new people to make drinks. We invite you to come back and get another drink and hotdog on the house. Again, we are very sorry and hope to see you again.

name: Maddy Halverson
text: Food is good and we always go for the waffles, but I miss the old one with full waffle, strawberry cream and strawberry… :/

name: Diana M
text: honestly at first i came and the service was weird and i felt uncomfortable and the food was eh, but i decided to come a second time to give it a fair shot and i rather just drive to atlanta for boba and food honestly. the tapioca pearls were hard in the boba and the boba tasted powdered and watered down.

resp.text: We're very sorry for the inconvenience. However tapioca pearls and Boba is the same and we never put powder in our Boba they're made fresh.

name: Breezy Ivey
text: The inside of this place was super cute! Service was great and my order was amazing too. Definitely check it out if you get the chance.

resp.text: I know its little late but thank you very much!

name: Heather Henderson
text: This place is so fun and different for the area! Food is great, the people were so nice, and the price is very reasonable. This is officially our weekend spot!

name: Anna Kim
text: I would not get the food it’s not good. I got the potato and cheese inside and it came out deformed. When I ate it the dough was not cooked and the cheese was all on the bottom and it was just plain messy and disgusting. The waffles with cream was really soggy and just not good.

resp.text: I'm sorry for your experience and we are trying to improve on things. Most of our food is fresh hand made so there is size difference.

name: Wyatt Northrup
text: Atmosphere is a bit odd, but staff was extremely friendly and the Garlic Shrimp Toast is great!

name: Connie Holland
text: I love this place so much....I traveled 2 hours just to eat here...if I lived closer I would be here every day!!!!!

name: sawyer
text: The food was not only extremely tasty, it was inexpensive too! The staff was very kind and the interior of the restaurant was to die for. This is a must try and must visit! My boyfriend and I are even considering going back again tonight to try something else!

name: Harrison
text: Excellent drinks and lunge environment. Tasteful lunch items as well. A must visit!

name: Jason Henderson
text: Food and drinks were great.  Nice relaxing environment as well.

name: Joshua Long
text: Took 5ever

resp.text: I'm sorry for our service took so long and we are getting more help to serve better and thank you for letting us know.

name: rylee
text: really good! the atmosphere is just so relaxing and amazing. such a chill spot. though, it’s not a place you would go to when you’re in a hurry because the wait is a bit long! but, it’s worth it in the end. the corn dogs has such a good crunch but mines didn’t have a cheese pull sadly, butttt it was still very yummy. the music is adorable and the staff is so friendly! i drove a whole hour to visit and i liked it! philly cheese steak toast was … literally…. so amazing. cute shop!

name: Jason Henderson
text: Food and drinks were great.  Nice relaxing environment as well.

name: Joshua Long
text: Took 5ever

resp.text: I'm sorry for our service took so long and we are getting more help to serve better and thank you for letting us know.

name: Stephen Trumbull
text:
When it first opened, I came here a lot. It was amazing. The ingredients were fresh and everything I tried tasted great. The service was OK, but it improved over time.

Then it all changed. I'm guessing ownership switched, and quality dropped. Nothing was fresh and it all tasted slightly better than fast food. I stopped going for awhile.

I tried it again in the last year and was pleasantly surprised. It has improved. Not the level it was, but it's definitely worth a try.

name: C C (ccc)
text: My husband tried the chicken burrito and I got the vegetarian burrito... both great. The salsa was really good too. Good Mexican food and I don't even have to go to a restaurant. Will return !

name: Brian Porzio
text: The burritos are stinkin huge! I am always able to finish a burrito from any place but not here. And it was delicious: the guacamole was amazing and the meat was great. Quick order and service too. Definitely best burrito in town!

name: Garrett Evans
text:
UPDATE: just got back to the house with my steak fajita burrito and I'm glad to report that it is a pretty good burrito 👍.

>>>>I used to love the fajita burritos, but since changing to Soho Kitchen they put some kind of Asian type dark sauce on the meat. Tastes like hibachi meat and does not fuse well with the burrito ingredients. I will reevaluate in a couple of months.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.  The recipe for our fajita burritos has not been changed except now it’s bigger and have chips/salsa on the side.  We strongly suggest you to double check with the food and your receipt next time to make sure there are no misunderstanding. You could request the staff to cut the burritos in half so to make sure it’s the correct order you placed, Thank you.

name: David Smith
text: Really loved this place when I visited a couple years ago. Came back and the owner must have changed. I got a burrito with Asian style white rice lol. Not good at all. I had awesome authentic salsa but now it was some nasty Sam's Club style from a can.

name: Ibe Morsi
text: Absolutely amazing and delicious food!!! Quick service, super friendly, and delicious/tasty food! Would HIGHLY recommend

name: Keith Jackson
text:
This place is closing soon, but it's always been really good.  They have excellent (and huge) breakfast burritos. Would go again (if it wasn't closing.)

Update:  Cazador bought this place!  This is good news.  Go there and check it out.  The food is better than SoHo Kitchen.

resp.text: Dear Keith, we are not closing.  We are just revamp our name and to reflect the expansion of our menu.  You will be still enjoy our quality food with a lot more new items that you could try.  Thank you and wish you will be continue visiting us!

name: Debbie Truthteller
text:
I don't think Asian and Mexican fuse together to good. I had the WORST shrimp quesadilla ever. Also, my steak burrito was HORRIBLE!

The homemade lemonade was excellent!!! The peach tea was also good.

resp.text: It’s unfortunate our quesadilla didn’t fit your taste pallet.  Perhaps next time you could try the simplified version such as “cheese quesadilla adds your choice of meat “.  Thank you for your feedback.

name: Heidi Noneya
text: First time eating here and I got the lemongrass steak plate it was delicious. Definitely will be going back!

name: Susan Moore
text:
I always wanted to stop by Burritos To Go and day had the opportunity to try it
Well I will definitely go back and encourage you to give it a try. Perhaps the best burrito I've ever had!

name: Garrett Borst
text: I love mexican food, but am not sure I like "their" mexican food.  I ordered steak tacos and they served me 2 tacos with more onions and cilantro than steak on a corn tortilla that was so soggy it shredded the minute I picked it up.  For over $5 you only get the tacos, no chips or any sides.  The burritos might be good as the previously reviewed item mentioned but I think I have given it a try one time too many.

name: K C
text: Amazing 3rd time here 3 different burritos all great just packed to explosion with meats vegetables rice and beans to top it off they give you some amazing salsa.

name: Michael D'Auben
text: Loved this place.  Great food.  Too bad they closed.

name: David Heinze
text: If you like burritos go here. This place is crazy good.

name: Nick Vaughan
text: Good food, not too expensive, takes just a little long to get your food though.

resp.text: Sorry for the delay.  We are a little short on staffs during the holiday hours.  Thank you for the feedback and we do appreciate your continue support.

name: Frankayla Brazzill
text: It was good it make you wanna come back then food are really good

name: Alura G
text: Very tasty!!! I ordered the bimbimbop (sp?) Asian dish, and my husband ordered the nachos with chorizo and that was AMAZING. Both dishes were nice and spicy, too!

name: Stephen Ross
text: SOHOs kitchen is amazing.  This place use to be a little Mexican burrito shop but the food and menu has become so much more now.  If you want the best Quesadillas and Nachos in Alabama for a decent price, look no further.  If you find your taste is a bit more eclectic you might want to try the Korean BimBim Bap.  Basically it's a rice dish with grilled spicy meat, steak or chicken, with steamed vegetables, also very good!

name: Duncan Maclean
text: Been here twice and the burritos are monsters.  Decent flavor and fast, friendly service.

name: J H (04579)
text: Just tried SoHo's kitchen for the first time, and it was delicious!! Fast and friendly service too!

name: Josh Barksdale
text: A nice spot to stop for burritos and horchata if you are passing through.

name: Karly0315
text:
Overall, very delicious food at a reasonable price. I ordered mine to go: Fajita Plate with chipotle chicken, add charro beans. The chicken had a nice flavor and heat to it. The guacamole was fresh and chunky. There are just a couple of things that kept me from giving it 5 stars:

- When I ordered charro beans, I wasn't expecting plain refried beans. Perhaps they are one in the same and I was mistaken.
- Most Mexican to-go places include a bag of chips and salsa. While I never eat the chips, I think the salsa would have gone a long way in helping the flavor of the refried beans (see above). Also, I thought fajitas came with a side of tortillas--but the fajita chicken and vegetables were so flavorful, tortillas were not necessary.

I would recommend this place and will definitely try it again.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We just recently cooperating with the online order/delivery service company.  There are several online options we are still refining to avoid misunderstanding between the customers and our staffs.  As for the chip/salsa, it only come with the burritos not with the plate.  If there are some special requests such as certain salsas you would like us to include or add tortillas…etc., please feel free to add instructions in the orders and we are more than happy to customize it for your needs.

name: Britt Bradley
text: So I normally go to this plus every other week and they just changed their name to Soho Burritos to Go. The name just sounds wrong. Anyways they are under new management and it stated that the menu is the same as Burritos 2 go. I normally get the chicken quesadilla, a fajita burrito, and dip. I Normally love the quesadilla because it's simple chicken, Mexican cheese,  and your choice of pico de gallo.  The chicken quesadilla was horrible. The menu has changed the quesadilla now has soy sauce. BAD IDEA GUYS WHO WOULD WANT SOY SAUCE ON A QUESADILLA!!!  My boyfriend called to ask if there was soy sauce on the quesadilla and the worker responded "not really" 😳 Wth does that even mean??!  You either have soy sauce on it or you don't. Then after all that they forget to put the fajita burrito in the bag. So my boyfriend calls them again and ask if they can remake it since they left it out and we paid for it and would have to travel 15 mins to get  back there. They said they would remake it. We get there and it was lukewarm. We won't be going back there.

resp.text:
Please forgive us for not fully meeting your expectations regarding your last visit.  We are the same owners but are expanding and still working on finding the best combination of ingredients for our new menu items and improving our work flow.

The quesadilla you used to order, is now listed under the cheese quesadilla add chicken and Pico de Gallo.  Our staff might not have clearly pointed this out based on what you were looking for as a returning customer.  We apologize for the confusion and are improving our service to fit our customers’ needs.

Regarding the ingredients, our staff received the call in a noisy kitchen environment and misunderstood the question about “soy sauce”.  The fact is, it is our new homemade sauce (definitely not soy sauce) added to the quesadilla, though we are still perfecting the recipe.  As a drive thru food service, we try to work as fast as we can.  The time between the call and the time you received the Fajita burrito, we regret you found that it was only lukewarm.  We will work to improve on the communication and timing to insure our customers receive the quality and temperature that is appropriate to the menu item.

We thank you for your feedback and are sincerely striving to provide the best service and quality food.  As a valued customer, we would like to offer you a full meal with your next purchase upon your return to SoHo’s Kitchen.

name: Dave Nugen
text: This place is under new management/owners, they are nothing like they were when they first opened, just had a chicken burrito, ordered beans, cheese guacamole, and sour cream on it, they barely put any beans/refried beans, A TON OF RICE, white rice, not spanish rice, and picodagio, which i didn't even order. They left out the cheese, guacamole and sour cream. Folks if you are going to run a burrito stand, how about making sure the order is RIGHT. Sadly dissappointed with the new management. not going back.

name: Kimberly Palmer
text: I Love This Place...Chipotle Who??

name: Jan Renegar
text: Excellent and tasty place to eat in Madison! Almost weekly visit :)

name: tiesha glenn
text: My fav... fajita steak burrito !!  Love it!!  Don't sleep on this place!

name: Prince Nwachukwu
text: My wife loves their burritos

name: Stephanie Davis
text: Awesome nachos and great salsa!

name: MarLa Davidson
text: My favorite is the Baja steak burrito!

name: Joey
text: Bean & cheese burrito add chipotle chicken and sour cream, NO RICE!

name: Latonya Satcher
text: I freaking love it

name: Robert Makowski
text: the burritos are great!

name: Travis Fly
text: Very good

name: Tim Miller
text: Love it

name: Manuel Holstein
text: Okay

name: Victor Hudson
text: By far  the worst food. I got 1 meat and 2 sides 11 dollars and corn bread. It was all hard and maccheese  taste like water down noodles cabbage  was so hard barley  could  chew it this is last time visiting

name: Todd Hooper
text: I was in the mood to eat some vegetables.  This place allows you to order a vegetable plate, and they have a lot of vegetable sides to choose from.  The quality of the food is good for a food court shop.

name: Kimberly Vega
text: I’ve eaten at this place for years and after dropping $36 dollars on lunch for my family they refused to give us condiments. Who charges for condiments?!  I won’t go back.

name: HERBS FOR LIFE
text: The quality of this food and service is a gift from every God ever to exist. The food is holy and heavenly. I am in awe and in great appreciation of my life at this very moment..each bite is a cluster of excellence simmered in love. THANK YOU FOR THIS SOUL FOOD

name: Brody Griffin
text: Was looking for a quick veggie lunch and found this little spot in the food court as one of the few vendors that did not have a dozen or more people in line. Got a 3 side veggie tray for only 5.99, not a bad price for the food I got. It was hot, fresh, and well seasoned.

name: Adam Frank
text:
My wife is vegetarian - that makes it hard sometimes to get food she enjoys when traveling. We were passing through Birmingham en route to Dallas and needed something quick to eat near the hotel.

We were greeted with a friendly face by someone who showed my wife plenty of options at a very affordable price. She loved the food.

Our only regret is we don't live here and can't come back. All the food here that we tried was spectacular. Highly recommend.

name: Megan Harris
text: Did not care for the dish I tried to many peppers and onions..had the Grilled Shrimp dinner

name: peyton blickenstaff
text: I have been really sick lately and doctors cannot figure out what's wrong with me and I was frantically trying to find soup at the mall because I was working and needed to eat but could not eat solids and no one had soup. Thankfully a woman at the farmers basket caught my attention and was very motherly and sweet about it and said she made some homemade chicken noodle soup for her coworkers and gave me some. She is the reason I feel better at this moment and I just wanted to say how sweet she was and how thankful I am that she found me in my state of panic. I can't remember her name but someone needs to give her a raise because she's amazing. Unlike the rest of the fast food mall workers who clearly don't want you there.

name: Vincent Wilhite
text: I love this place every time I go to the Galleria I eat here.The staff is very nice. The prices are good.

name: Brad Hamilton
text: 5 star rating for a mall food court joint? Yep, because Farmer's Basket is legit. It's 2 Legit to Quit (eating there). Get drawn in by the samples, and stay for the quantities and prices. You can literally feed the whole family with one meal (I know because I did). Two meats, and two vegetables go a long way when they pack out a styrofoam to-go container. The crispy honey chicken is not to be missed, and the fried chicken tenders are spot on. Love that you can get soul food and Asian in one spot

name: Fullypure Formarriage
text: Yummy wholesome comfort food to fill this big belly! Thanks all!!!

name: M Miller
text: Good food for the mall.

name: Sash hsaS
text: Affordable and great tasting food.

name: Leeds Alabama
text: Great food at a great price !

name: Nilla baby
text: Food is delicious!

name: Taylor Clem
text: loved this place for YEARS!

name: Linniar Plummer
text: I Love It

name: Richard Bruce Hamilton
text: Shhh. It's a secret.

resp.text: Hi Richard, thanks so much for dining with us, Farmers Basket and thanks again one more time for leaving a kind comment about our cuisine, service, and rating!! Hope we have another chance to serve you right again in the very near future! Most importantly, stay safe! 😊

name: Craig Parker
text: Very average

name: CantBeAfraid ToTry
text: Food is always fresh. Tea is awesome. U get plenty for your money! $13 2meat 2 sides and a beverage. Money well spent

name: Reed Dye
text: Tiger VR has become a personal favourite for me and my roommate! I absolutely love the place, and their food is amazing for the price. The service is quick, and employees are extremely nice :)

resp.text: Reed! Thank you for take review, it meaning a lot to me. Thank you for choosing us.

name: Yang Hu
text: Delicious Chinese Food. Typically tofu, beef noodle, very tasty.

name: Rachel Griffin
text: The front host was super sweet and kind. I love him and the food. Great customer service and patience.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review

name: Patrick Parish
text: The people and service here are spectacular! Also the food and Milk tea taste great. It’s a great place to get authentic Asian food and one of the only places to get milk tea!

name: J Walters
text: Probably the fastest service I've had at a restaurant locally and the food was on point. Can't tell you about the VR but the set up looks amazing

name: Tandra Smith
text: Their bubble tea is great! Price is awesome too. There’s not many of these places in the area, so glad to have them here. Haven’t had the food, but I’m sure that’s good as well.

name: Harper Rhett
text: Love this place! Amazing food, boba, and service!

resp.text: thank you! Come to see us soon

name: Shekiese Barnes
text: Everything was so good!

name: Alexander Cardona
text:
Auburn has plenty of great Chinese takeout places, but this one takes the cake. We were going to grab sushi, but I had never seen this new place. While waiting for our orders I had the opportunity to use their VR rig, jaw dropping experience. They now have a lunch menue that comes out to being more food for less than meal at chickfila.
Being walking distance to campus I will definitely be going back

name: Alice Jones
text: The staff is so sweet. The food is delicious. Check this place out!

name: Chu Meen
text: Dope. And always the nicest staff ever. Cool little place, very fun atmosphere

name: Ashleigh Schneider
text: Very nice food and service. Service was absolutely amazing and very polite. I would definitely eat here again. Tasty boba too, would highly recommend the chocolate milk tea and the rose milk tea. :)

resp.text:
thanks for the comment helping us
a lot

name: Tammy Odom
text: Stephi Cocktails & Cuisine in orange beach is a unique pairing of Asian and Caribbean fusion. We found the food to be flavorful and plenty. The atmosphere is airy and the staff is wonderful and attentive. We were greeted by a sweet young lady who promptly seated us. She introduced us to their menu and suggested a great starter. We also were impressed by management. She took the time to ask us how we were and have a light conversation with us. No drive by hello. We had the Caribbean chicken wings with a trio of sauces. The wings were so well seasoned that sauce wasn’t even needed. Then the entrees, don’t get me started on the great flavor profiles.. The Caribbean Shrimp bowl has the most tasty pineapple chutney done 2 ways… yum. The Korean Beef bowl was in a citrus herb crema that paired nicely with the coconut rice. In a nutshell take a moment stop in for lunch ( portions are generous)!

name: Kim Morris
text: We came across this wonderful spot on our beach trip and was not disappointed at all, we absolutely loved it! Kit and Kristy were amazing, everything from their friendliness to their bomb@ss cocktails, to their attention to detail, we couldn't have been happier with our experience. Also THE FOOD, insanely good. This will definitely be a regular spot for us when we visit Orange Beach. ❤

name: Tabitha Mckown
text: AMAZING food and service.  We found our new favorite place to eat at Orange Beach!  I was a little hesitant because there was no wait, but I was wrong!  This place is a hidden gem!  I had the filet and it was so tender I didn’t even use a knife.  The sushi and desserts are great, too!  Everyone at our table loved their food.  This place will not disappoint!

name: Karen Sepko
text: STEPHI WILL NOT DISAPPOINT!  The best Asian Fusion in the area!! STEPHI is in the shopping center across from Phoenix 1-4 condos in Orange Beach!  There is so much flavor in ALL the individual items on your plate.. from the marinated pickles, slightly sweet coconut rice, full flavor prime beef and perfectly blended flavored chef special sushi rolls.  The hard chocolate shell over wonderfully creamy ice cream was dreamy.. seriously.  The 2018 pendulum red blend Wine is fine... service is impeccable too!  Check Danny Reynolds came to visit the table to ensure we were happy... top service for sure!!  Oh and live music on Friday and Saturday night beginning at 8:30pm!  Try STEPHI’s .. you won’t be disappointed!!

name: Shanni Payne
text: Looking for a place with amazing food? Look no further! This place is outstanding! The food is served and looked like something out of a magazine. In fact, we saw an ad in the Islander and I immediately asked where this place was, as the food looked stunning!  The service was great as well. The manager came by and literally treated us like a good friend or family. I was shocked this place only opened a few months earlier. It will be beyond outstanding in due time. I can’t say enough about Stephi’s!

name: Nelda BRUNNER
text: Stephis was an amazing find in a little strip mall.    Drinks were exceptional, ambiance good and food was excellent!  And there was no waiting in line.  other places had 1-2 hr. wait time.  This is a diamond in the rough!  you will not be disappointed!  I would give it 5 stars!!!

name: Todd Munroe
text: My wife and I dine here quite frequently. Service can be hit or miss but it doesn't stop us from coming in. We've discovered whenever we get served by Ashley our experience is always the best. We casually mingled amongst ourselves and wondered how this place found her. She's the most competent, professional, and knowledgeable server there. Other servers aren't terrible but can tell they are newer and usually seem frazzled. The new manager is very friendly, she stopped by our table to check on us and that was the first time that's happened to us there, we loved her professionalism. This place is starting to become our new go to spot. Food is fabulous and their new cocktails are even better than before! Great restaurant!

name: Cynthia Griffin
text: We tried this restaurant on a day when we needed somewhere close by to go for lunch that would take up an hour or two. The atmosphere is relaxing and inviting. The meals were perfect portion sizes. We got the lunch menu but there are other items you can order from the dinner or full menu as we saw from other people dining in the restuarant. It was a gem to find. Well definitely be going back.

name: israel Carlisle
text: Excellent food and service. I will definitely come back. Hannah was our waitress.

name: Nelda BRUNNER
text: Stephis was an amazing find in a little strip mall.    Drinks were exceptional, ambiance good and food was excellent!  And there was no waiting in line.  other places had 1-2 hr. wait time.  This is a diamond in the rough!  you will not be disappointed!  I would give it 5 stars!!!

name: Todd Munroe
text: My wife and I dine here quite frequently. Service can be hit or miss but it doesn't stop us from coming in. We've discovered whenever we get served by Ashley our experience is always the best. We casually mingled amongst ourselves and wondered how this place found her. She's the most competent, professional, and knowledgeable server there. Other servers aren't terrible but can tell they are newer and usually seem frazzled. The new manager is very friendly, she stopped by our table to check on us and that was the first time that's happened to us there, we loved her professionalism. This place is starting to become our new go to spot. Food is fabulous and their new cocktails are even better than before! Great restaurant!

name: Deedee Thames
text: I'm giving 4 stars because the Sushi was pretty good. It is pricey, but good. The staff was friendly. I called my order in and was told it would be ready in 15 minutes. I waited a total of 48 minutes for my sushi order. I understand that they were in the process of training someone on making sushi, but 48 minutes was a bit much. We were offered 2 free sodas for our wait. That was thoughtful, but extra sushi would've been great or free sushi would've been even better!

name: Ashley S
text: Beautiful restaurant with delicious food! The steak sliders and empenadas are absolutely phenomenal! Best sushi chef in the area!

name: Jennifer Ellison
text:
This place is a jewel. Great food, great drinks,, great service.We started with empanadas and lumpia. It was excellent. Extensive cocktail list. Great wine list.
Kit and Kristi were incredible!

name: Zach Pickard
text: Waitress was friendly and fun. Food was good too. Interesting drink, tasty and very sweet. Something Something Baccoo

name: Jeff Mondick
text: Found this place while looking for cocktail bars in Orange Beach.  Great selection, super friendly staff, we will make this a regular stop.  Kit and Kristi really took care of us!

name: Quinn Sisson
text: Super cool little spot. Very pricey but I understand they are new and have to cover up front costs which can be a LOT to handle. Loved the owner coming out to the table and saying hi. Very personable guy. Will be coming back here again when I save up some fun tokens to blow.

name: Mark Kline
text: This place is amazing.  The food is unique and stellar.  So many different flavors and influences...Latin, Caribbean, Asian, and just funky.  Great drinks and staff also.  We really enjoyed the experience and the food.  And make sure to try the empanadas.

name: Leah Finlay
text: I love the cozy atmosphere and great customer service. Everything I tried were delicious! BY THE BEACH sushi was the best, I highly recommends this restaurant. We’re definitely going back!

name: Scott Gund
text: Totally unexpected meal experience.   This is NOT the place to go if your are wanting typical Gulf Shores food.   It IS the place to go if you appreciate Asian and Caribbean flavors and specialties.   Trust me on this, have the Poke bowl and be sure to include the Fresno chiles.  They are not the heat in the dish.  The Kimchi brings it.

name: israel Carlisle
text: Excellent food and service. I will definitely come back. Hannah was our waitress.

name: Natalie
text: Stephi’s is consistently AMAZING!!  We seriously ask each other in the family where we want to go OR order in from and it’s ALWAYS unanimously, Stephi’s!!! It’s consistent and the levels of flavor in each dish are extraordinary!!  The Caribbean Bowl is my fav...hands down!  Excellent food, atmosphere and service!!

name: Rita Hays
text: This restaurant is so different than the others in all the best ways. You walk into a modern yet cozy atmosphere and service is on point. The cocktails are so unique and the sushi was absolutely delicious. We will make this a regular spot to eat for sure.

name: Patrick O'Keefe
text: Wow, understated exterior, but food and cocktails great, service excellent, one of top 3 dinners during our stay, but more affordable.  Chicken Satay and Caribbean bowl a good place to start.

name: Ashley S
text: Beautiful restaurant with delicious food! The steak sliders and empenadas are absolutely phenomenal! Best sushi chef in the area!

name: Zach Pickard
text: Waitress was friendly and fun. Food was good too. Interesting drink, tasty and very sweet. Something Something Baccoo

name: Lauren Lee
text: Amazing food and drinks! All the seafood is fresh, the sushi is very delicious. Great international flavors which this area needs. Will be back!

name: Meghan Newport
text: Amazing food and service. The Caribbean Sling was one of the best cocktails I have ever had!!

name: B C
text: Fantastic Food and Drinks. This is one of the most unique places in Orange Beach. Everything is top notch. The sushi and meals are amazing, the drinks unlike anything in the area, and the atmosphere makes you feel welcome and comfortable. If you are in the area and want a unique superb experience you have to try Stephi.

name: Gage Redman
text: The food was absolutely amazing. And the staff were very nice and I definitely recommend the wings

name: Peter Traina
text: Fantastic Food....Top of the line cocktails..excellent service...live music 4 nights a week...definitely check this place out!  Sushi!

name: Jennifer Dood
text: First time in the amazing State of Alabama and had the BEST MEAL AND AMBIANCE here!!! We were part of a party of 18 and they welcomed using, fed us an AMAZING dinner and treated us to FANTASTIC MUSIC!!! Thank you 💗💗💗

resp.text: Jennifer, It was a pleasure to meet you and your family. We are so glad you enjoyed your experience. We hope to see you next time you are in town!

name: Cindy Mann
text: Amazing lunch experience!  The Chicken Satay Skewers and Cucumber Salad were delicious!  I highly recommend!

name: MargueritePerkinson
text: I’m a local. The food was great! Drinks fun and great as well. Steak was best I’ve had here. Sushi also fantastic. I’m excited!

name: Marissa Quinn
text: Worst experience I’ve had in a long time. Called ahead because 2 of us have to eat gluten free and was assured by GM Nick that most menu items were or could be made gf. He told me to make sure the wait staff knew and they’d take care of us. Waitress was not knowledgeable about gf which is fine, asked for Nick and was told he quit that day. (wait staff  looked upset/shell shocked?) Manager was HORRENDOUS and rude telling me NOTHING could be made gf including the rice!  She told me I was ‘causing a scene’ when I asked if there was anything I could eat and proceeded to blame everything on Nick. We were a party of 5 and the 3 non-gf had already ordered so asked for it to go (2 celiacs didn’t eat!). They even screwed up that order, the veggies were cold and the food (they said) was not very good.  THEN they said we didn’t show up for our reservation via Open Table so we can’t review them.  Figures.  Super disappointed.  Literally the worst restaurant experience we have had in Orange Beach.  I can only hope the owner makes some serious changes quickly.

name: Amelia Queen
text:
Manager was rude. My mother and I were eating out and we had to get gluten free food as we both have Celiac Disease. Earlier, we had called and the person on the phone told us there would be things for us to eat. We come in and order appetizers.
When we get to entrees, we learnt here is nothing to be had so we talked to the manager about it. Turns out the rice is not gluten free. THE RICE. However, the teriyaki, a sauce made with not gluten free materials, apparently was.
So we talk to the manager about this. We ask about the call earlier that confirmed we could have something, and she says the employee had walked out just hours later (I can see why) and he may have done that to deceive the company. (?!?) So we ask her what we can have and she says vegetables and seafood. We ask her to specify and she tells us to not make a scene. We were just asking her what we could eat.
I ended up crying due to how rude she was. If you can mess up rice and don’t know what’s in it, how can you be trusted to make anything else?!??!?

name: Cherry Ann St Hillier
text: We had fantastic dinner there with friends. The food is delicious and a great price. Very good service and yes we will definitely come back again.

name: Brittany Fielder
text: Amazing food and friendly staff! Definitely will be returning!

name: Cherry Ann St Hillier
text: We had fantastic dinner there with friends. The food is delicious and a great price. Very good service and yes we will definitely come back again.

name: Brittany Fielder
text: Amazing food and friendly staff! Definitely will be returning!

name: Rachel Aumueller
text: STEPHI’S!!!!!! Best restaurant on the island! Quality food (sushi, steak, burgers, chicken, etc.), live music, bar seating, kid friendly, and an overall great atmosphere!! I highly recommend that you take a visit to the Stephi restaurant!!!!!!

name: Zharren Young
text: Amazing place to dine in. Ambiance is simple yet classy and relaxing. Great place for family dinner, friends get together or simply night out to relax and have a drink. Food is amazingly tasty and affordable. Highly reccomended

name: Paige Albert
text: Wonderful food and wonderful service!! Highly recommend!

name: Danielle Doyle
text: Amazing food!!! Amazing service!!! We will definitely be back!

name: Robbie Ludlow
text: Location used to be Franco's Italian. Immediately noticed the new tenant and had to try it.  OMG... absolutely amazing food, flavors, and service. Shared the Prime Ribeye (with asparagus, smoked corn cakes, and some incredible unknown dipping sauce), a Papa Bear sushi roll (seared scallops on top...'nough said), and the Korean Beef Bowl (grilled steak, coconut rice, asian vegetables, with a teriyaki glaze) with my friend. Paired the meal with a bottle of 2018 Pendulum Red Blend Wine. Finished the meal off with the Chocolate Dome desert. Service with our waitress Ashley (highly recommended...request her) was attentive but not overbearing. If you are wanting a great place to enjoy an amazing dinner in Orange Beach, AL on your beach vacation...look no further.

name: Renee OKeefe
text: Great food! Good drinks! Highly recommend!!!

name: Alyssa Mabrey
text: Amazing food! Great servers and really good live music!

name: Levis Lee
text: What a joke ! 54 dollars for sashimi....nothing there ! Owner too busy talking about how much money his liqueur cost then to care about customers having to go to rouses to use the restroom . Good luck 👍

name: Susan Powrie
text: A welcome addition to the area with a diverse menu and attractive decor.  I ordered the Spicy Thai Pork Noodle Bowl--which was FABULOUS, even though we were not permitted to sub out the kimchi for additional soba noodles.  Those noodles are craveworthy, and I'd love to see them as a standalone menu item!  My husband had the Pinchos de Pollo--which was also very good, but an extremely small portion for the money.  He was offered a drink or dessert to compensate for the lack of dinner (which we appreciated), but another skewer of chicken or a vegetable would have been far better.

name: Ricky Cook
text: Great place to eat had a Great time.

name: Dawson Gribble
text: Great food and awesome drinks! Service is amazing!

name: Riley Sieron
text: horrible sushi everyone i was with threw up after.

name: Dequan Bey
text: Great food amazing service

name: Aaron Hudgins
text: Great atmosphere and better service!

name: Joshua Kesling
text: FANTASTIC!!!! Chef is ON POINT!!!!

name: Gail McDorman
text: Awesome food and atmosphere 👍

name: Rick Naqvi
text: Seriously overpriced for what it was.

name: Mia Roberts
text: Unkind service.

name: Joshua Kesling
text: FANTASTIC!!!! Chef is ON POINT!!!!

name: Skye Brown
text: Absolutely tasty! My husband and I shared the spicy Ramen bowl and the teriyaki chicken dumplings with fried rice. For the two if us, we couldn't even finish everything. Good made fresh and the owner was very helpful in helping make our dining selections.

name: Maria Mcmillan
text: The food and service was excellent. My husband and I will be going back soon.

name: Scott Kimsey
text: Food was good, recently become so popular they were out of their homemade, handmade dumplings.....very apologetic....they should take it as a good sign.  Ramen was good.....humble restaurant, but good tasting, good portions...we will be back.

resp.text: Thank you Scott. Very good sign indeed. We just wish we could let everyone try the Jiaozi and we will try to make more to feed everyone.

name: Jillian Wade
text: Spicy Pork Ramen didn’t have any broth. Which is strange and doesn’t equal Ramen. It was also just not seasoned. Had to add our own sauce and that couldn’t even save it. Dumplings were undercooked and bland. Fried Rice tasted of nothing but garlic. Won’t be going back.

resp.text:
Our Dumplings are always cooked, always.
Mazemen is a style of Ramen with no broth.
Fried rice is complimentary to the dumplings.

I see you ordered through doordash. Because of delivery time lengths can be longer we cannot guarantee the food as if you ate at our restaurant.

-Steve

name: K Schroeder
text: The pork fried dumplings and fried rice were really good!

name: Leslie
text: This place is incredible everything is made to order fresh.  The staff is so friendly, kind, and helpful. I loved the atmosphere and the way it had be redecorate.  I will definitely be back.

name: Kenya Knox
text: They are very good ! Food taste homemade. I tried the dumplings and the noodles with the peanut butter. Absolutely great! I would recommend

name: M Elizabeth
text: Honestly thought this was gonna be a soul food spot by the name but it is chinese food. Very good chinese food may I add. Family oriented establishment with kind staff.

name: M Elizabeth
text: Honestly thought this was gonna be a soul food spot by the name but it is chinese food. Very good chinese food may I add. Family oriented establishment with kind staff.

name: John j
text: This is a hidden gem. The restaurant is absolutely spotless. The owner was so polite and welcoming. The food was terrific. No complaints, or improves; the handmade dumplings were delicious.

name: Chaos in Fallout “Dave”
text: Teriyaki chicken w doughboy style rice was delicious. It was perfectly seasoned and they use chicken thighs as the meat so it was moist and flavorful. Also had the beef stuffed dumplings which were also pretty good. The owners were great and polite and they also support military. Great in my book. I’ll definitely be back for more.

name: Ruby Jones
text: Ordered the signature fried rice and it is so delish!  The restaurant is very clean and roomy, very nice owners as well! 10/10

name: Staci Shoemake
text: The food here is delicious and the employees are so friendly.  All of the dumplings I've tried so far have been outstanding!  I can't wait to continue trying different items on the menu.

name: Brendan Youngquist
text: Great handmade dumplings and fried rice. Very nice people too!

name: William Boswell
text: Clean dining room. Friendly, helpful service. Delicious food. We'll definitely be back.

name: SIX SPEED JONES
text: Absolutely incredible food.. I had a craving for Dumplings and was skeptical. This place is great!

name: Clarissa Clark
text: You will not regret eating here! My husband and I ordered take out last night, the doughboy fried rice, chicken teriyaki and pan fried dumplings, it was SO delicious! Everything tastes so fresh, it’s not overly salty like so many Asian restaurants and the service was great! We can’t wait to go back and try more stuff!

name: Abe Delacruz
text: Only got a bowl of noodles not good at all

name: Jennifer Smith
text:
Absolutely delicious Asian Fusion food! I had the Chicken Satay Soup, Fries Pork Dumplings and Chicken and Dumplings (I couldn’t decide!)! I’m so glad I ordered so much because I made it into four meals and looked forward to it every day for lunch. The dumplings were juicy and delicious. Very much a traditional dumpling. The soup was out of this world. I wanted it to have a stronger coconut flavor but it was still phenomenal. The chicken and dumplings were great! I usually like my broth thicker but still great.
Love that they use chicken thighs for maximum juiciness and flavor. Can’t wait to order again!

name: Chris Epp
text: The service here is extraordinary! And the food has to be out of this world because people are constantly ordering take out here. I would know, I'm a delivery driver :-) you like dumplings? You like Asian Cuisine? This place is for you!

name: Gene Wilson
text: Good food and this is by far the cleanest restaurant around phenix city or Columbus

name: Brandon Nelson
text: Great food at a great price!

name: Rachel Armstrong
text: Great food and awesome service!

name: Beau Reimink
text: The best dumplings, fried rice, and ramen  noodles around! We love this place

name: Sara Ann
text: Ordered a few items to try, pan fried dumplings, pan fried rice, spicy chicken ramen with dumplings and teriyaki chicken with white rice.  All of the food was amazing and we had enough for dinner and lunches for two.  We will definitely be ordering again.  The hours posted on google are central time and the location indicates on the wrong side of the highway for some reason.  My husband picked up the order and said the owner was friendly and service was great.  Will be ordering again for sure!

name: Dillonnn
text: Authentic Chinese food, all of the ingredents are fresh! Service 10/10 would highly recommend.

name: Edward deGruy
text: Excellent food and great service.

name: Brandon Purvis
text: Great food. Great price. Super friendly staff.

name: Allan Brown
text:
By far the best dumplings I have had, very fresh and tasted great.

I was a little apprehensive about the potential quality of the food since no one else was there, but was made to feel right at home and the food was wonderful.

If I could say one thing, let the nearby people eat here so it doesn't go anywhere, I don't think I can go back to Walmart potstickers.

name: eric
text: Excellent, fresh hand rolled authentic chinese dumplings

name: Evan
text: Some of the BEST dumplings I've ever had.  Definitely worth stopping by to grab some great food!

name: Christi F
text: Really good!

name: Webster Campbell
text: great food and great service

name: Milton Watts
text: Best Asian food in Phenix City!

name: Chris McMillan
text: Excellent food and service

name: Donald Pierce
text: Great food and great staff!

name: Willian Vaz
text: Best dumplings and stir fry I ever had in the area! Fully recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. Please, come back and enjoy again. 试试

name: Tiffany King (Tiff)
text: Delicious!

name: Bradley Harp
text: They have dumplings, noodles, stir fry, and fried rice.

name: Josh Sanders
text: This place is a local masterpiece. The food is ALWAYS made to order. The staff is INCREDIBLE and helpful. There is no place I would rather take my wife to eat on our date days. We love Doughboy Dumplings, and I can guarantee that you'll agree.
